metadata.title: Cem Altun | Composer & Sound Designer - Zürich
metadata.description: Official website of Cem Altun. Composer and Sound Designer based in Zürich. Specializing in film scores and theater music.

about.title: About Cem
about.content:
Hello, I am composer Cem Altun, based in Zurich, Switzerland. I was born in 1975 in Bursa as the son of a music and folklore teacher from Artvin. My childhood was shaped by a rich musical education filled with mandolin, flute, choir, piano, and bağlama lessons.

After settling in Switzerland in 2007, my professional life advanced in the customs field. Having completed two different customs schools, I continue to work as a customs officer at the Zurich Briefzentrum. However, throughout this entire journey, I never disconnected from my true passion: music.

I strengthened my academic foundation in narrative composition by completing the Certificate of Advanced Studies (CAS) in Composition for Film, Theatre, and Media at the Zurich University of the Arts (ZHdK). within this scope, I have composed original scores for six theater plays, two documentaries, two promotional films, and one short film; additionally, I have participated as a composer in numerous advertising projects.

While blending classical and neoclassical approaches in my work, I emphasize emotion, atmosphere, and dramatic structure through cinematic piano and orchestral arrangements. My goal is to create a musical world that deepens visual storytelling through sound, supporting the narrative like an invisible character.

If you enjoy discovering cinematic piano textures, orchestral colors, or highly expressive instrumental music, you are in the right place.

works.title: Works
works.desc: A curated collection of soundscapes composed for cinema, theater, and digital media. Journey through the essence of sound.

general.title: 1. Overview
general.content: As Cem Altun ('We'), we value the security and privacy of your personal data. This policy explains how your data is processed when you visit cemaltun.ch.

data.title: 2. Data Collection
data.content: There is no membership system on our website. The Name, E-mail, and Message information you share via the contact form is stored solely for the purpose of responding to your requests.

cookies.title: 3. Cookies and Analytics
cookies.content: Basic cookies and anonymous statistical tools may be used to improve the user experience. This data is not personally identifiable.

rights.title: 4. Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or request the deletion of your personal data. For inquiries, please contact us via the contact form.
